title: Is artistic expression a bedrock of our Constitution? | The Excerpt
shortDescription: The Trump administration is targeting “woke” culture. But can a democracy thrive without artistic freedom?

title: Is artistic expression a bedrock of our Constitution?
shortDescription: The Trump administration is targeting “woke” culture. But can a democracy thrive without artistic freedom?

title: Show and tell: Trump sets Wednesday deadline for tariff offers
shortDescription: The Trump administration wants to see countries' best offers by June 4, according to a draft letter.

title: What is 'TACO trade?' Social media reacts to term about Trump tariffs
shortDescription: A Financial Times columnist has coined the term "TACO trade," saying Trump always chickens out of his tariff orders. What is behind the viral acronym?

title: Mike Johnson: People won't lose Medicaid 'unless they choose to'
shortDescription: The sweeping Republican tax-cut bill includes new requirements that are projected to remove millions from the Medicaid program.

title: Trump administration asks Supreme Court to allow mass federal layoffs
shortDescription: In an emergency filing, the Justice Department said the court should lift a federal judge's order pausing mass federal layoffs and ending programs.

title: Trump gives Musk an Oval Office sendoff | The Excerpt
shortDescription: Plus: An obscure provision in the House bill threatens enforcement of court rulings on Trump. | Trump will double tariffs on foreign steel to 50%.

title: Democrat's maverick senator still a 'no' on Trump tax bill
shortDescription: Sen. John Fetterman has irked Democrats with his independent streak, yet he says he is with his colleagues in opposing the sweeping Trump tax bill.

title: Barron Trump rejected by Harvard? He wasn't. Trump family college list
shortDescription: President Donald Trump is in a bitter battle with Harvard University. Barron Trump attends NYU. Melania Trump said Barron did not apply to Harvard.

title: Supreme Court takes up challenge to grace period for mail-in ballots
shortDescription: Republicans want to prevent states from counting mail-in ballots that are cast, but not received, before the end of Election Day.

title: Clinton defends Biden on health reports: 'I never saw him that way'
shortDescription: Bill Clinton said his 'only concern' about President Biden was whether he could have served a second term until he was 86 years old.

title: Senate prepares to tackle Trump's big tax bill – and make some changes
shortDescription: President Trump wants the Senate to slash taxes even more than the House-passed bill - and get the whole thing to his desk for signature by July 4.

title: Trump's tariffs 'not going away' amid legal fights: White House
shortDescription: President Trump would invoke other tariff authorities if his appeal of a trade court's ruling isn't successful, Commerce Secretary Lutnick said.
